description: Light and comfortable fleece sweater with a half-length zipper – Abisko Lite Fleece Half Zip M is great to wear as a first or mid layer in warm climates. It is made from recycled polyester that transports moisture away from the body and dries fast. Regular fit with discreet thumbholes in the cuffs.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Lite Fleece Half Zip - Mens
